The following is a list of libraries in Nigeria.

References[edit]

  1. ^ a b "African Libraries and Archives". Africa South of the Sahara. USA: Stanford University. Retrieved 6 June 2013. 
  2. ^ a b c d e f g h i j k l m n o p q r s t u "Shame of a nation: Problem-ridden public libraries". The Punch. 1 January 2012. Retrieved 6 June 2013. 
  3. ^ a b c d e f g h i j k l m n o p q World Guide to Libraries (25th ed.), De Gruyter Saur, 2011, ISBN 9783110230710 
  4. ^ a b c d Glenn L. Sitzman (1988), "Nigeria", African Libraries, Metuchen, N.J: Scarecrow Press, ISBN 0810820935 
  5. ^ a b c Sam C. Nwoye (1977), "Libraries in Nigeria", in Allen Kent; et al., Encyclopedia of Library and Information Science, Marcel Dekker Inc, ISBN 9780824721206 
  6. ^ C.C. Aguolou; et al. (2006). "Impact of Technology on Library Collections and Services in Nigeria". In Ravindra N. Sharma. The impact of technology on Asian, African, and Middle Eastern library collections. Scarecrow Press. ISBN 0810854481. 
  7. ^ C.C. Aguolu (1980). "Evolution of the National Library of Nigeria: Antecedents, Establishment, and Recent Development". Journal of Library History. USA. 15. 
  8. ^ a b Anthony Olden (1985). "Constraints on the Development of Public Library Service in Nigeria". Library Quarterly. USA. 55. 

Further reading[edit]

Bayero University library, Kano, 2011
Published in the 20th century
  • S.B. Aje (1956). "Public Libraries in Western Nigeria: a General Survey". West African Library Association News. 2. 
  • J.A. Faseyi (1968). "Public Library Service in the Former Northern Nigeria". Nigerian Libraries. 4. 
  • C.C. Aguolu (1977). "The Foundations of Modern Libraries in Nigeria". International Library Review. 9. 
  • Anthony Olden (1995), "Northern Nigeria Regional Library", Libraries in Africa, Lanham, Maryland: Scarecrow Press, ISBN 0810830930 
Published in the 21st century
  • D.F. Elaturoti (2002), "Development of Public and School Libraries in Nigeria", Proceedings of the PanAfrican PanArab Conference on Public and School Libraries, The Hague, Netherlands: International Federation of Library Associations and Institutions, ISBN 9070916851 
  • Christian Chukwunedu Aguolu; I.E. Aguolu, eds. (2002), Libraries and information management in Nigeria, Maiduguri, Nigeria: Ed-Linform Services, ISBN 9789788023012 
  • David Raitt, ed. (2005). "ICT Developments in Nigerian Libraries". The Electronic Library. 23.
